content.query:
CREATE PROC checkCount @sourcedb NVARCHAR(10), @sourcetable nvarchar(10) ,@startdate DATETIME,@enddate DATETIME
AS
BEGIN

Declare @availablecount int;

set @availablecount = (select count(*) from CONCAT(@sourcedb,'.',@sourcetable) where inserteddate >= @startdate and inserteddate <= @enddate)

select @availablecount as countcol

END
